text: Armageddon (2007) was a professional wrestling pay-per-view show made by World Wrestling Entertainment (WWE). It took place December 16, 2007, at the Mellon Arena in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania. It was the eight Armageddon event held by WWE. ==Matches== ==References== ==Other websites== *Armageddon Official Website Category:WWE Armageddon Category:2007 in professional wrestling Category:Sports in Philadelphia Category:2000s in Pennsylvania
